amendment.description: Amendment allows small-scale Hispanic irrigators to be eligible EQIP funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to allow small-scale Hispanic irrigators to be eligible EQIP funding.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
